title: Sufood
description: High-end vegetarian cuisine chain with locations in Taiwan. Modern, upscale decor. Features a set menu for around NT$400 (US$13). You choose from one of few main entrees, plus you get appetizer, bread, soup, salad, dessert, and drink. You can only order it as part of a set menu. Some dishes use eggs and dairy. The servers will ask you what you eat and don't eat and will point out which dishes are suitable for you. Chinese name is 舒果新米蘭蔬食, address 桃園市大同路11號2樓.
